page.text: The long grass rustles noisily just ahead, a large tuft wobbling in a way that has nothing to do with the breeze...
Oh my god you got away just in time. If you'd of stayed there you could of...come down with hay fever?

This dense thicket of stems will yield up its secrets to your draconic snout, that much is clear. The reason for its rustling will be revealed, you shove your nose deep into the depths of the cluster. However, you can find nothing suspicious except some footprints..as if the thicket was vacated swiftly before your arrival, but where could the leaf rustler of gotten to and what is that sensation as if your tail is caught in something hot, tight and sticky and...

The raptor cocks his head to one side looking back at you unafraid and perhaps with a hint of mischief in his eyes. Seems like you've been tricked and surprised, and it seems you're about to be far more than just that. The Raptor makes a sorta coughing chirp at your struggles, seemingly laughing at your struggles as he clenches his tip around your hindquarters and pins your rear legs against your slender, flexible and remarkably easy to schlurp down body. You're probably not long for this world outside his loins that you'd be enjoying till now, but on the plus side he's enjoying putting your manytimes larger body into his balls a great deal.

choice.text: his enjoyment is no kinda plus side, nuuu

gameover.text: The raptor rubs a leg against his sack and feels naught but sloshy goo yielding under him..oh yes, it's time. He strokes off yet more vigorously, jerking his dragonfed schlong as he closes his eyes, gasping and chirring in delight as he revels in your churning form fluidly moving in his sack and how easily you were tricked into a state where he could schlurp you up.
